Amber Rose Gill enjoyed soaking up the sunshine this summer in Mallorca, showcasing her hourglass curves in many different bikinis, and she has done it again.

The 21-year-old Love Island winner has shared a sexy snap of herself posing against a rock while quite literally looking like a fire emoji in a deep plunge neon orange swimsuit as she looks ahead.

The Geordie beauty oozed body confidence as she showcased her cleavage and envious curvy body, as she covered her face with sunglasses.

The star also made clear in the villa that she was a confident girl as she rated herself ten out of ten.

(Image: Instagram)

Amber flashed a smile as she visited America in the run up to her Miss Pap collection launch, showing she had no care in the world.

Making a further statement, the star pulled in the swimsuit's ties to emphasise her waist, and pinned half of her bouncy hair back while the rest of it fell effortlessly over her shoulder.

(Image: Instagram)

She's showing ex Greg O'Shea exactly what he's missing in her neon number.

During her stay in Miami, she bumped into rapper Tyler, The Creator.

(Image: ITV)

And she appeared starstruck in a video on Instagram as he brought her pancakes for breakfast ahead of her fashion shoot with the brand.

Amber has kept herself busy since her split with hunky Irish Greg, as she has thrown herself into work - and the Miss Pap deal made her £1million richer since bagging £50,000 as the Love Island winner - but she had to split the winnings with former flame Greg.

(Image: Joe Pepler/PinPep)

But the straight talking diva joked that Greg can "keep his" £25k share from the £50k prize fund.

Fans begged Amber to get him to give back his half of the cash.
description: She's showing ex Greg O'Shea what he's missing in a hot Miami throwback snap
